Messages.Author: Mathis Emmanuel Lamarre
Messages.Content: Dear all, Unfortunately there are more registered participants than the maximum number allowed (8). Hence, please attend the first lecture today to activate registration. 8 participants will be randomly selected based on TU rules [1] (see Section 48) after the first lecture. In today's session, we will mainly go over organizational aspects. Cheers, Denizens team Links: ------ [1] https://www.static.tu.berlin/fileadmin/www/10000000/Studiengaenge/StuPOs/AllgStuPO_en.pdf

Messages.Author: Mathis Emmanuel Lamarre
Messages.Content: Dear all, You can find more information about the neurocolloquium on our lab website: https://denizenslab.github.io/teaching/seminars/Neurocolloqium/ Cheers, Denizens team

Messages.Author: Mathis Emmanuel Lamarre
Messages.Content: Dear all, Today the neurocolloquium will take place in room 5.044. Cheers, Denizens team
